values:
When I first joined my company, I thought there were a few guys whom i thought should be aj... got that feeling. One of them is a manager... Especially when he smiled at me sometimes, and i returned back the smile... haha... so today more or less, it's confirmed...

He came over to look for my neighbour who wasn't around so he began talking to me...

He: (*stops at my desk) So today never go gym ah?

Me: (*thinks: why u think i will go gym today?) no leh...

He: oooh... 
(*lowers volume abit)

He: U went for the what Fabulous nights one ah...

Me: (*thinks: How u noe about Fabulous nights! Must be!) Yeah haa... 

He: At the St James right... Haa... I saw your photos there at the where mah...

Me: U mean on the AFA website? I was volunteering that night mah...

He: So many photos of urs up there!

Me: Where got many! Only 3! (yeah lor! ONLY 3!!)

He: Issit? So how was it? Crowded?

Me: Yeah not bad, quite fun. (Cute guys!!) But very crowded! Also for the new year one, that one, was really very crowded! 

He: Oh...

So as he was walking away...

He: (That "arm chio" face) Clubbing... sian...


Tell me, how can he not be aj right?? I knew it! Haha... maybe he just wanted to confirm if i am aj too. I think my photos there already more or less confirm le...

Now, the other staff... how to confirm if he's aj?? Ha...

I think i should do this... A recap of 2007...

Jan:
Booked on this job in audit which was my favourite job!
1. Actual OT hours was lesser than other jobs, but my OT claims were more than other jobs which i put in longer hours! wtf!
2. Venue was great... in chinatown! Can eat good food everyday, going town is convenient too. Now that i mention, my other audit clients were always in faraway and/or ulu places.
3. And my sup, snrs x 2, a2, fellow a1 and interns were all a crazy bunch to work with! Learned a lot working with my sup too.

The only heaven job i had... =)

Feb:
CNY.

Mar:
I decided it was time to throw in the letter w/o getting a job first.

Apr:
Last day of work in the place. Seriously i didn't really miss anything there, except for some of the better seniors there and my gang there.

Oh i went for cabin crew recruitment drive in this month... Didn't even get pass the first round!
Per some experienced people, the reason was due to I talked too much during the opening intro speech. Sigh. I think some people think it's ridiculous for me with my qualif to go for it, but i dun think so. Most of my friends were pretty supportive tho.

May:
Slacking month! Hah!

Jun:
Joined a totally different profession with a totally different lifestyle. I now still dunno why i joined it... spur of the moment ba perhaps. Gosh. So i'm so gonna condemn P company because they were the one who kindled my interest to go for this profession...

Jul:
Annual reservist. One of the times when i can meet up with the gang again. The attendance was quite good, tho the nus people had to go back for convo on certain days. Had fun as usual... ha!
I think in 2008, the attendance may not be so good... which is not good since it's hi key.

Aug:
Eh national day? Met up with new friend on the internet to watch fireworks.

Sep:
New job. They say it's another shit hole... haa but i do sort of enjoy it. I'm just waiting for the peak to start... i'm not crazy, i just want to experience it!

Oct:
My bdae... Old liao by 1 year again...
Went cable-ski for the first time with D and her friends. I dun think i am suitable for ski-ing la...
CY had a chalet and H14 apus peepz met up after a long long time.

Nov:
Grasping the ropes of my job. I admit i am quite a slow and cautious learner.

Dec:
This month like most happening...
CFA exam, gosh i need a miracle. My wish for 2008 is that i can pass the CFA!
Bought my psp too. Bye money, hi psp!
Games i/c for dept x'mas party and somehow became the emcee too... I really think it was quite fun to host but if i had been more prepared the previous night, it'd had been better.

Then celebrated the x'mas and new yr period by MJ-ing, drinking, clubbing etc... Met new frds too.

No wonder Dec passed by so quickly... My most enjoyable and happening month of the year.

People i treasure with... my family, better controlling my temper i suppose... Tho still remain distanced from some...
friends... the people i used to hang out with fm nbs and hall and army, making new friends constantly... haa
colleagues... helpful and kind... no one plays politics here (i think), so this is definitely good. Maybe coz my dept is quite small.

2008... it will be a better year!

Falling in love should be a sweet thing right? But what if i dun find it sweet? 
The age gap is something that i find it hard to overcome... But his sweetness is indeed sweet. But only make me more confused lor...

As people say, to love or to be loved? I think i am the one with the problem, i dun have confidence that i can love him back.  So how? 

That's why always better to be alone... no need so much trouble.

Wah today's accounting 2 paper sucks! Arrgh think i did something incorrect, in fact, a lot of things?? Haa... I choose not to think about it and think of myself as still right, at least i wun feel so bad... Stupid direct labour hours... arrrgh...

But honestly studying for that doesnt really helps, haa...

Tuesday was Research Methods... a crappy subject, thus crappy exam questions, but i hoped i crapped and analysed those multiple regression correctly.

2 days later will be a hell-subject, heng i only took as a general elective... BF307 Derivative Securities. Worried coz i understand only 15%, not worried coz its a GE, but i believe i should still worry... hedging and arbitraging... hmmmm...

Can finally watch Ren Wo Ao You tonight, missed it last nite! Kaixin will know the truth tonight that 10 is the trouble-maker... finally ah, dat girl... haiyoh... But her character so tame, dun tink can see much bitchiness from her... but then can one imagine Fiona Xie bitching instead of acting cute?? But you'd never know... Anyway MCS should make yilin as a totally evil person, betray her team and cross over to the other team, then i can see fewer of this evil bitch too!

That's Yanzi's latest album! With a free singlet!

The songs are great... including the Wo De Ai, Ben, Wo Ye Heng Xiang Ta, Tong Lei... ^_^

About my exam prep... hmmm... getting rather bored and sianz... i feel that i have studied most of the necessary stuff, tues open book exam so theres really not a need to study so much for the subject. Main killer is on thurs but i thought i studied most of the required stuff, sat is even killer subject, but then its just my general elective, so... haha...

The saying goes, "The more one studies, the more confusion one receives." Well well. I should play some games... haha... Coz i am sianz now not becoz of studying, but dunno what else to study...

Once again I am returning back to hall on monday morning... Sunday night or monday morning? Just wanted to spend more time at home, even tho returning hall on sun night is better coz...
1. Mon no need wake up so early.
2. MRT got seats... Mon morning confirm no seats unless i take 6am to 625am train, den have to stand all the way from eunos to boon lay... haiz... If i go back sun nite, it'll usually be quite late, so mrt sure got seats...
3. Need not bring all my stuff to lessons on sunday nite... if gg back on mon, i'll prob be gg to lessons directly...
 
Thats y, i will strive for a no-monday-8.30am-lesson if possible...  best is monday 1230pm or no lessons on mon!
 
MRT ride to boon lay is long... i prefer sitting down n listening to my mp3s...  like gg back to sch n home alone dats y, can listen to songs all the way n think bout a lot of things...

Tomorrow will be preparing preparing presentation, but so happy... coz going town to do! Haha coz i having been to town for very very long, dunno y... And thus even tho it'll be doing work, but at least its in town not school again! Will be preparing for finally presentation for biz comm, so happy too coz after this coming week's post-test and grand presentation, can cast aside my biz comm, no exam! But cannot play play coz post written test is 10% and grand presentation is 25% = 35% of total grade marks in this coming week! Wah...

Watched TV juz now... SG Idol Jerry is out... ok la, i dun really cheer for his exit, but a bit sad, coz its always sad to see someone leaving and then they play the final video and speech and they sing their last song... But i guess tho he may be sad, he's also relieved bah, even if he stayed and improved, there will be judges' bias and audience bias... haha... then later watched Survivor...finally the guys and girls tribes are spilt... But then y issit that the guy leader gets to choose his tribe 1st, den later the gal... Or did i miss some heads/tails thingy...

And now the tribes are spilt, i shall not fail to mention the stupid old guys who voted out all the younger guys in the earlier episodes, and the only yong fit guy is John now, and the tribe he is in wins the 2 consecutive challenges... n the other tribe, i really think that the young girls r fitter than the old guys... stupid old guys... haa... Bubba got voted out... FINALLY the older guys get a taste of being voted out! Serves them right! Haha...

Shit la... wanted to study one den spent the last 4 hours watching TV from Xi Ling Men to Survivor... Haiz...

27 Days to Exams....

The Countdown Begins...

On my way back to hall last nite, the bus broke down! And it was close to 12am... arrrgh bad omen? Nope, i view it as getting down from the old bus and travelling a smooth transition on a better bus (double-deck air-con vs the broke-down single-deck...), thus a better year ahead! And thus that was my first present, a complimentary SBS bus tix ride... -_-"
 
Reached hall, bathed and a while later, they came into my room! Namely yuqian, peiqiao, shanyi, yaokun, zhiqiang & edwin... And my present from them was a pink Puremilk tee! The one i wore today if u noticed... hehe... so cute! Thanx to them! ^_^
 
Then today in evening, was treated by another group of friends to Seoul garden, them namely wenhua and the couple, shimin n zhonghui! Sumptuous meal there, especially so long havent eat at seoul, thus it doesnt hurt to eat so sinfully meaty! Thanx!! ^_^
 
Also, thanx to everyone who sent mi sms greetings! Guess who's the first? It's ms pingwen! Hehe... osso was surprised to receive sms from old friends whom i havent been keeping in touch with... Thanx all! ^_^
 
However i am still awating greetings from a few friends though... 30 more mins... Who will be the last? 
 
Its amazing too how a year has passed... One year ago i celebrated 21 bdae, now is 22... no longer a child, but den... haiz... haha...

Is there something wrong with my msn or wat? i keep getting logged off... sianz... might as well be offline... So i m hardly online now till the thing hopefully resolves by itself...
 
Maybe coz i always log in msn in school, so now osso affected? Sianz...

COLD cold daeeeeee n cold colde niteeee.... *bluuuuuuuuurrr*

So much work 2 do... so much so much...

Term break was lost in doing nothing... Monday spring cleaning, tues n weds doing accounting project, thurs was KTV n bash, n finally fri to sun was working in roadshow.

No time to study in term break, and lotsa assignments n projects...

Countdowns:

6 weeks to exams or so *gasp* time to number my days soon again. 1st paper is research methods, if u ask mi what is that subject about, good question... the textbook so thick somemore, dunno where to start... heng exam only 50% and open-book... 2nd paper is accouting 2, 60% exam but not open book... think i can expect lotsa theory once again... 3rd paper is options, futures n deriavatives, took this because the dean recommend us to take, heng changed it to from a presrcibed to general elective, dying from it, no doubt useful but tough, n with more than 1/2 taking from acctg  yr 2, tink the yr 3 B&F will gain... then 10 days break until company law paper, haha... can leave the company law aside first before exams. Where's my other subject... Biz Communication... oh yeah, no exams wor, all course work... dat means every assignment i write n presentation i make muz be taken seriously...

And... 12 more days countdown... waahaha...

It's finally the term break!!! One week of no lecutes, no tutorials, no presentations! Haha...

Although I have 3 projects due after term break, 2 due in October, some more persuasive and bad news letters 2 write and presentations 2 prepare, and many many stuff to catch up... haha... but then, can take a break and breathe!

Benjamin won The Next Big Thing on Ch U, ok la, neutral towards him. But at least he looks cute, better than giving the award to someone ugly. But then all of the contestants are yandao or chio bus leh... Personal fav is Charissa Seet, Xue Su Wen... at least she got an award for Ren Qi! Should have sent an sms to vote her, maybe i could have won something.... hmmmm....

And so happy that Yanzi won awards in both taiwan n singapore! Good good!

Lagging behind my studies... jcrc stuff has been busy, n it'll get busier soon... but of coz its part of my job... at least i have my weekends to myself n family...

Some of my classmates have been contemplating if they should go for exchange in sem 2, they haven only start thinking in these recent weeks, n the dateline is next mon... a lot of things 2 consider... i know some others who went this sem...

A bit disappointing, thought the 3 of us may be working together fyp, but W decided 2 join alvin n perhaps xp. Well alvin is a smart ass, n so is W, so obviously he would join al since al asked him, n the other grp mate might most likely be xp. So left mi n Z. Now if the other grp mate is not xp, den CFM Z will join them, coz Z osso smart one ( n yeah the 3 of them can tok bout soccer from day 2 nite n do soccer as fyp). N i m not that bad either, juz that i dint put in effort for sem 2, but my sem 2 results r better than W lor. Maybe coz i appear slack ba...

Then another frd X asked mi too, coz she orginally dint wan join yi n yy as she said 3 girls work 2gether like not very balanced. I can c dat Z wun wan to work with us if i join X coz X isnt dat smart, n actually i osso dun really wan... coz she's 1. VERY busy wif wsc 2. the pt that she didnt wan work wif 2 other girls imply that she wans to work wif guys n perhaps 'make use' more 3. same reason as Z.  So i somehow persuaded 2 work wif my n yy, dunno her decision yet... Maybe i shld have accepted when xy n sh asked mi even earlier then... but that was really too early 4 mi 2 make any decision...

No matters wat happen, hope that our friendship will remain...

Sian la... like too early for fyp grouping, but some of my frds form liao n even ask tutor liao! N the sub-dean talked to us, group B students, coz our PA will be in Yr 3 sem 1, leaving us not much time for fyp den. Thus we may have to start earlier. Of coz not to the extent that he ask us 2 form groups now, but i guess what he said will wake us up n realise that time would pass very fast...

Sianz~

At age 21, i realised that there are still many things that i would wish to learn but cannot due to financial constraints...

1. Driving. Tink it's quite essential, but certainly not really now as i dun haf a car at home... But if i know now its definitely better... Nice to have a driving license in my wallet as well...

2. Play the piano. My mum told me that when i was young, she asked mi if i wanted to learn playing the piano and i replied no... But that was when i was young, how would i know whats a piano? But anyway even if i learnt when i was young, i would most prob forget it now as there would no space for a piano in my home anyway. Now i would learn to play it simply out of passion, but piano lessons are exp... so maybe when i start working ba...

3. To sing. My singing really sucks, maybe its at 20% now, maybe singing lessons will bring it up to 70%, which may be good enough for mi... I juz want to sound better singing in ktvs only... haa...

4. To play the guitar better. I know a bit of strumming but i know there is much room for improvement.

So many things to learn, and when i start working there wun be enough time for ALL that. But not when i m retiring too... But i guess i will find time in the future... hopefully...

I have time now but no money... muz it always be such a trade-off? I would rather have both at the same time... Study hard now, earn money in the future, den no time to learn what i wan to learn? Hmmm... haha...

Better dun tink so much now... haha...

Havent been here for so long sia... haa

Was video-taped today! She's my Biz Comm tutor and she video-taped every1 as well... SOoo scary when she told us to watch ourselves alone after she uploaded it... I can't stand watching myself, and hearing myself... Said too many "eh" n "erm" i think, not very fluent, but i think i was one of the few who smiled... hehe...

Biotherm came yesterday, invited by the ABC... so many great offers! Got some free sample moisturizers and bought some products at cheaper rates too! Yay~~!

No money... gt 2 bank accounts, but both less than $30...

Haiz...

Then still have to man booth tml... Shouldnt have joined this cac pdn stuff, waste time, heng i m juz a sub-com, heard there are even more probs in main com...

Went to eat at newton last night... took so long to manage to find a seat for about 10 people...

Then later at night played mahjong... played 2 rounds, n overall won only $1... Haiz... Won some big bcuks a few turns but then lost the money subsequently... so in the end i was back to square one, no gain no loss... Heez...

Tml 8.30 lec... sianz... *yawnz*

Weather kinds rainy n cool nowadays, compared to the sunny n hot climate a few months back. I like the sun, but i also like this weather. It's cool, and somehow,  gives a bit of ai1 chou2 feeling. Think my mood somehow affected by the weather at times... Thats why, i must learn to enjoy the sun when it is out instead of complaining how sweaty n sticky it makes me. Somemore, i need to suntan more often now since i am back in hall...
 
In such cool n non-sunny weather, I like listening to songs such as Yanzi's "Yu Jian", Elva's "Di Xia Tie"... That feeling's creeping up in me again, that feeling of where and when and how that person is now. That feeling of you dun know who the person is. That hope with a tinge of hopeless.
 
Alex Toh got a new mtv where he strips... Kinda pathetic that he has to do such a thing at his age to attract attention, and somehow his body is not as good now, a bit flabby liaoz...

First day of school... With a 8.30am lecture! My PE seems quite tough but its definitely useful, at least i think i am mathematically inclined...

Then the break came... Went to eat Mac bf before we went to queue for F.I.R... the queue was initially quite short b4 we went to eat but just half an hours time, the queue was super long!!! Hengz i saw my friend behind so i cut, with my friends, then he got another 2 friends who cut too... think the people behind quite dulan... haha... Then later 2.30 went for another lecture...

Yay tomorrow F.I.R. concert!

And i was so happy today coz i went school with my new highlights n my new pink Pure Milk tee!

But i am wondering if i should really take my GE n pursue a minor... 6 subjects, 22AUs for this sem quite siong... Hmmm...

Hall FOC is over! But i dun have as much fun as during NBS FOC. The feeling of a freshie and a senior is indeed different...

1. I clicked better and know the 25 or so freshies in my NBS group more than the 10 or so freshies in my hall group. Less people, more bonding...? Maybe so for the freshies, but not for the seniors. Moreover our group has too many seniors attached...

2. Unhappiness and a misunderstanding during my hall FOC that causes me to sulk and pissed off that evening as well as not joining for the supper event. The misunderstanding goes like this: There's this game where we have to look for a chess piece hidden by the programmers. I found it pasted by a masking tape to the inside of the roof of a stand, and removed it to shade a paper over it. The masking tape wasn't sticky so i was afraid it will drop if i pasted it back, so i put it on the top of a horizontal light, which wasn't too far from the original position, and moreover it was by the side where it could be easily seen.

Then as we proceeded, the programmer called and said the group couldn't find the piece. So i told her where i put it. And i heard that the other group wasn't too happy coz they spent a lot of time looking for it. (Well, so did everyone else???) When we past by them, their CGL, Baozhen, totally boh chap us. My CGL, YQ, wanted to go up and explained matters to her after the whole game ended, and i thought i should too since i was the one who placed the piece. But that bitch simply ignored my CGL when he approached her and went to the toilet! I was feeling quite apologetic initially but seeing her attitude, i was fed-up! It's just a game, girl! I went back to my room and didn't join my group for supper event. And the programmers also knew and they understood and they said it wasn't my fault too. But i just felt so ^*&(&*%%^.... i tink no one else in my hall has seen me like that before, so unusal from my usual self...

The next day things were okay as YQ told us after the debrief that Baozhen also said she was just unhappy and she wanted the FOC to go smoothly as well. So things were okay.

But i knew i was and am still not okay. I didn't know Baozhen well, and now i don't think i would want to know her well too. I have no mood to be high the next day also. As for the running of JCRC, i guess i will still be running to maintain my single room, but i guess certain things are changed now. Moreover, i rather be in the main comm than subcom.

I registered for my General Elective (GE) just now. Inclusive of my GE and PE (Prescribed Elective) i now have 22 AUs... Bought 2 new textbooks (Accounting II & Biz Comm), will get the other 2 soon 2nd hand (Research Methods & Deriative Securities), as well as AC208 Company Law that has not arrived yet. NIE campus no longer gives foolscape when we buy textbooks, somemore cannot use VISA to accumulate points... I shall buy from Popular for my Company Law textbook then...

Need 2 buy new textbooks again... Heard that the AA102 itself costs around $60... Sianz.
 
Need to highlight my hair as well.
 
When will Yanzi be coming out her new album?? Looking forward...

Went back to school today to draw my hall key and help SM chop n paste notices... Thanks to my junior yaowen whom drove me to hall, my nbs camp junior who happens to stay in the same hall as me! My single room seems actually quite big and spacious, and quite cosy too! However I can't find my pillow, bolster and blanket which i thought i put in the JCRC room... Never mind, maybe it's time to get new ones, as well as maybe a bright n cheery bedsheet! I don't have any cute cute bedsheets at home, thought of getting one leh...
 
Anyway then WH came to my hall n fetched me to Can B... Ate char siew rice while waiting for SM to arrive with her posters... Then we went Popular to buy thumbtacks. And we checked out the textbooks... Arrgh AA102 Accounting II got a newer edition which the salesgirl said is quite different, so muz buy new one... think only AB213 Research Methods can use back old one... den AC208 Company Law need a new textbook too, co-written by one of the lecturers, AB214 Biz & Managerial Communication osso new textbook as the syllabus has changed: no more final exams for this subject! Then need to buy textbook for my PE too! *Broke*...
 
Then went SAO... arrgh posters can only put up for 2 weeks, so hoi they all decided to have put up til the week when the pdn is about to start... Then too early to chop! So it's a wasted trip! Haiz... 
 
Btw anyone tried this? http://http://www.wholivesnearyou.com/ Can check who lives in your block n who lives near u! Hee!

Tickets to be distributed on Mon and Tue (26th n 27th) at Canteen A and NY audi at 12noon.

Ahhh... FIR! Must queue liao!

I'm baaaaaaaaaaaaack from my NBS FOC!!!

Although i went there as just a senior attached, i enjoyed myself thoroughly, even though i didn't play much of the games. Stayed for the entire 5 days and helped my CGL n GLs to lead the group when necessary. Can see myself last year in the camp as well, only that this year my status is different.

Clicked quite well with the juniors too... Coz i was with them throughout and had a lot of chances to interact with them. Of coz its quite tiring but its really enjoyable.

And i am still recovering from my loss of sleep from the past 5 days... Shall elaborate more when i feel like it again... Now still a bit lethargic... heheheh...

Went Pulau Ubin cycling with army friends, although it's just the 5 of us, (mi alan sq peck jw) and the weather didnt appear too appleasing initially, we had fun! Cycled for 3 hours plus, explored the island, climbed up a hill where the view is breath-taking, can see M'sia and even airport. Not to mention i had a slight fall, and jw went to get a lot from the Tu Di Gong temple. The people there were friendly too, and one uncle offered us jackfruit. Actually P Ubin is quite a nice place, away from all the noise, disruptions and busy lifestyle. A bit like outfield, but haa, we are on our bikes... Most of the trail is actually quite trekkable and its not that hard to navigate around. Just that upslope tends to be quite tiring, as well as some of the rocky narrow trails...

After then we went to meet edwin who dint join us for ICT for dinner in orchard. Went to this shop in Lucky Plaza, which food is ok la, with all the canned sharks fin, and cheap abalone... Then went to play warcraft, machiam like NS days! Haa... but we went to this shop which costs 10 cents/hr lesser than mechmaster downstairs, but its connection sucks. We managed only one full completed game in the 1 hour plus. But then it's always JW who got disconnected, so maybe it's the person... Haven't played for so long, dint know what units to build so i just anyhow... haha but with good teammates we still managed to win...

That's another day passed... next week it will be NBS FOC... going as SA only, so no stress, no commitments... i hope... haha...

DIY colour hair, expected, didnt produce the colour i wan... haiz... As for the aspirin mask, its a DIY mask dat has generated much raves because it is cheap, effective and easy! Just do a search on any search engine and u can find many results on it... Get great reviews from other Singaporeans from Flowerpod forums too! It works because aspirin contains BHA, which helps to exfoliate the skin. After the mask, ur skin will feel smoother, more radiant and less blackheads! Moreover, it does not have side-effects (unless u eat it...). What i did: 1. Buy aspirin tablets. Get either the Bayers brand or the Disprin brand, easily obtainable from Unity, Guardian or Watsons. Btw, dun be stupid to use panadol... they're different... 2. Drop 4-6 tablets in a clean bowl and drop a few drops of water. Not too much as it will become too watery. Aspirin dissolves in water easily, and if it doesnt, maybe u can crush the tabs instead using the back of a spoon. 3. Apply directly onto clean face, and wait for time to be up, about 15 mins. 4. Time's up when the bits start dropping and u start sneezing. Dun rinse them out first! Gently scrub your face with the bits and make it a scrub now! Then rinse them off using warm water. 5. Your skin should look and feel smoother and more radiant, and less blackheads. Pimples may also subside by the next day. 6. Follow up with usual regime. If u r using a AHA/BHA normally, u need not use it as the aspirin mask is already one itself.

Its one plus midnight n i m terribly hungry... Went to toast 2 slices of bread, normally i would be too lazy to do so as i needed to take out the oven, which actually isn't too hard. Toasted one side, den later put a slice of cheese on one slice n toasted the other side. Then i coated the uncheesy slice with condensed milk, stuck the 2 slices together n now i m eating them...

I love sweet things. I remb a few times b4 i coated toasted bread with honey... hee...

Tml i will be trying out asprin mask n DIY colour hair... busy day...

<font color=white>
I am back after so long... too tired to come online after working for the past few days... only got energy to watch TV... haha

News report that guys are advised not to put our handphones in our front pockets, the radiation can reduce sperm production by up to 30%! Wow... first handphone radiation affects our brains, and now our sperm... Then where can I put my phone? If put inside bag, I cannot hear it ring or feel it vibrate, got some missed calls just now as a result... Paranoid? Better be safe than sorry when it comes to health...

Finally bought a new pair of earphones in Sony today when i was passing by their shop. Was fasinated by the $80 white color ones, but it just seems tooo exp for a pair of earphones. So i settled for a $29 one... Honestly does one really hear the sound difference in such a more expensive pair? But the expensive ones do look more cool. Headphones look cool too but i dun really like them, dun like the feeling of something clipping on my ears there, and may also be too fragile for my handling...</font>

<font color=pink>
Ever since last night, when i logged in to LJ, i saw Chinese words on the homepage, in the menu fonts, almost everywhere! Is LJ trying to test the proficiency of my Chinese? At least I am glad the language is not Malay or Indian, but I still prefer English lor!

Have been replaying Ocean's songs in my computer... so nice... And i realised that Singapore is the only country where his song moves up the pop charts (Peng You Ni Hai Hao Ma? on YES 933). Was going through my bank statement just now... POSB deducts $2 for balances <$500, which turns out to be $24/year. This isn't exactly a lot, but it seems ridiculous to let them deduct every month... But if i put $500 in, i definitely cannot promise myself not to touch it... It can be spent easily in a few weeks time... Maybe i should just cancel my POSB and move all my GIRO to my UOB campus account, at least no minmum balance to upkeep... UOB campus card also looks much more nicer than POSB debit card...

I am back from my 4 days ICT!! I must say that it was quite fun and enjoyable, can see my old friends once again... I was feeling quite high throughout and behaving like a siao person... haha... We did stuff, like mortar drills... Slower than before, nonetheless to say, but I think we all are still quite zai. We did section live firing too, the first time for us as we are in support company and have never done such riflemen stuff. But its not bad, firing live rounds! No one got killed btw.. hee... And we also had our IPPT in-camp... And yay I got my silver... I managed to pass my most feared static stations, STB n SR, safely, and my running, if i was 12 seconds slower, I would have lost my silver. Can't imagine how all of us were so fit before, can't imagine I got gold before... Fitness has definitely deteriorated over this one year for everyone... I guess my occasional jogs in hall helped... h yeah, I must mention, I still hate camo... And we did other crazy stuff too... like celebrating sw's n ray's birthdays with beer n noodles, pity we were mostly too shag by sunday night to do much. Other stuff include locking someone in a cupboard... haa... and talked lotsa stuff too, like educating the less-educated ones on sex and stuff with expert advice from people like mel... Haha! As for the HR part, most of the platoon seemed to have changed not much, siao people are still siao, dark people are still dark, idiotic people are still idiotic. PC is still the same, we still dun like him much. Sebas, our ex-PS, is now our CSM... phew! We'll all die if we are still inder him! Cedric is now our PS, and life is definitely better... As for the rest of the specs, they also do not seem to change much and we can still get along. I was feeling still quite energetic on the last day honestly even though i was aching all over like everyone. The ICT was like a relishment of the NSF times when trainings were slack. Although it's fantastic to go home and be a civilian once again, it means saying "Bye!" to everyone once again... Hope to see them once again soon! ^_^ SQ's arm over Mel... Yeeming n mi Raymond n Siwei celebrating their bdaes Siwei n Davin

Have been away for these 2 days... coz i have a 2 days assignment, to work for Sony, help them put up their promotional ads (mid yr promotion...).

Just checked my examination results online, and I am quite delighted with my results!

AA101 - Accounting I : B

Actually in the beginning of the sem, I thought I can confirm get A for Accounting coz i studied before in JC... but as it turned out, the paper was full of theory questions, i made many careless mistakes in the short questions calculation part, my acctg project was ok, not fantastic.Considering the final exam was only 55%, well actually i also dunno... Ok la, B...

AB102 - Financial Management: A

Yay! Even though i made a few careless mistakes, i guess my project done with ruishan was not bad. (Copied some stuff from my accounting project, and guess this project is done better coz i'd learnt some lessons from my acctg project...)

AB103 - Statistics: A

Guesss i did well for this paper coz it's very mathematical (like FM). Guess i am more mathematically inclined. Most of my friends who work hard score A in these 2 subjects as well, i wonder who scored A in the other 2 subjects... Anyway i worked hard for my stats, spending many days understanding the models and SPSS outputs...

AB112 - Marketing: B

A crapping subject. At least i have learnt to crap well, getting a B instead of C... i hate crapping subjects actually... My hands get so tired from all that writing...

I got a B for my General Elective anyway... So i have no 'C's for this sem! Yay! ^_^
